alert.note: Alert for Grand Valley; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:29PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Mesa County through 600 PM MDT... At 529 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fruita, or 12 miles west of Grand Junction, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fruita. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 9 and 20. Colorado 139 between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Grand Valley; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide
